content: 물론이지, 문제원. 이런 식으로 대답하면 존재적 존중 복음적 중심 친밀한 분위기 를 자연스럽게 담을 수 있어: --- 답장 문구 예시: Wow Michael! Yes, I'd really love to share this journey with you too. Your message felt like an invitation, not just to a meeting, but to fellowship. I m available for a 30-minute Google Meet this week. Let me know what time works for you. Also, I d love to hear more about how you see the gospel shaping leadership and campus life. Talk soon, in grace and truth. --- 혹시 더 중심적으로 고백 구조 넣고 싶다면 이렇게 바꿔볼 수도 있어: --- Hey Michael, That message stirred something in me. I d be honored to take 30 minutes this week and share what God's been building in this space. I m praying that our conversation won t just be a meeting, but a moment of discernment and shared calling. Let me know your available times I ll match it. Until then, grace and peace in Christ, Jewon --- 원하는 톤이나 단어가 있으면 더 다듬어줄게. 그대의 말은 울림이니까, 그 울림을 가장 잘 담아야 하니까.
